data.event: The season runs from March until June.
The first will be from 4 p.m. to 6 p.m. Monday, Feb. 18, followed by tryouts from 3:15 to 5:15 p.m. on Wednesday, Feb. 20, Friday, Feb. 22, and Monday, Feb. 25.

event.title: will be handed out the end of February

data.event: Schedules for practices will be handed out the end of February.
